claim: every club from the turkish ice hockey super league have play at the bel - pa arena
resp:

1. Identify the clubs listed in the table, which are part of the Turkish Ice Hockey Super League (as they are all present in the table).
2. Check where each club's arena is located, as per the "arena" column in the table.
3. Compare the arenas of these clubs to determine if there is a commonality.

The claim is FALSE because not all clubs have the same arena. In this case, only the clubs 'başkent yıldızları' and 'anka sk' play at the 'bel - pa' arena while the other clubs have different arenas.
